name: The Last Dream: Developer's Edition
description: “Reality and dreams are about to become entwined…..” The Last Dream: Developer's Edition" is a casual adventure game which, despite having some classic casual elements, will also offer a greater challenge for more experienced gamers.

reviews.review_text: It's a decent game. Voice acting is meh, but the visuals are beautiful. Most of the cut scenes are in live action, but are skipable. It's a very quick game, but once you complete it there is also a side story and the option to replay puzzles. I got it on sale so it was worth it.
Fantastic story with lots of movie sequences inbetween puzzles
Key provided by developer/publisher. This does not effect my review.
